Title: Episode #4.3
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), James Dormer
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Rhona Mitra, Robson Green
Plot: Section 20 tracks facilitator James Leatherby in Beirut. They continue to use Kamali in operations on al-Zuhari and Leatherby. Dalton is making bad decision due to her emotions over Baxter's death. Section 20 acts on tips about al-Zuhari.
